column2: my pizza arrived..half pepperoni half sausage. Omg
column3: so good. The crust was nice and crispy and my first bite and a burst of flavor. Pizza was expertly made as it left me to wonder how the toppings don't fall off.  You can taste all the ingredients in every bite
column7: crystal working in perfect harmony.  So glad I made the decision to go here.  Now I need to go back to giordanos and have myself a little contest.
